description: Try our easy to follow Creepy Capsicum Jack O'Lanterns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stuffed vegetable,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,High protein,Rice,Dairy free
name: Creepy Capsicum Jack O'Lanterns Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Cut the tops off capsicums and remove the seeds. Using a small, sharp knife, cut faces. Reserve off-cuts.

Place capsicum cups and tops on a tray and bake for 15 minutes. Whisk eggs with sesame oil. Heat 1 tsp sunflower oil in a frying pan over medium heat, add eggs and swirl to coat pan. Cook over medium heat, swirling for 2-3 minutes until egg is just set. Slide onto a plate.

Heat 2 tsp sunflower oil in a large frying pan or wok, add spring onions, garlic, peas, corn, carrot and reserved capsicum and cook over high heat for 3 minutes. Add rice and snow peas and stir-fry for 1 minute. Stir in soy sauce and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Roll omelette up into a cigar shape and slice into 1cm-thick strips. Spoon fried rice into hot capsicum. Layer strips of egg to form spooky brains.
